org.apereo.cas.logout

Class LogoutManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apereo.cas.logout.LogoutManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogoutManager

    @RefreshScope
 @Component(value="logoutManager")
public class LogoutManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogoutManager
    This logout manager handles the Single Log Out process.
    Since:
    4.0.0
